set(FASM_SRC
  Fasm.cpp
  Fasm.h
)

include_directories(
  ..
)

add_library(fasm STATIC
  ${FASM_SRC}
)

target_link_libraries(
    fasm
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Fasm.obj
)

set_target_properties(fasm
    PROPERTIES
    ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib"
    LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib"
)
